Welcome to CodeTest’s documentation!¶

Contents:

class benchApp.BenchApp¶
get_all_daily_balances()¶

Get daily balance for each unique day

Returns:
Dictionaries with date: total for all dates in transactions
get_all_transactions(category=None)¶

Get all transactions for inputted category. If no category is inputted, all transactions for all categories are returned

Args:
category – category to get transactions for
Returns:
list: List of transactions
Raises:
AttributeError: When the given category cannot be found
get_balance(date=datetime.datetime(2016, 6, 27, 0, 15, 20, 769210))¶

Get daily balance for given date (EOD balance)

Returns
float: daily balance for that day. 0 if date is prior to all transactions.
get_total_balance(category=None)¶

Get total balance for inputted category. If no category is inputted, total balance for all transactions is returned

Args:
category – category to get balance for
Returns:
float: The total balance for inputted category
Raises:
AttributeError: When the given category cannot be found
class transaction.Transaction(amount, company, date, ledger)¶
__eq__(other)¶

Overriding the equals operator Checks each data field is the same for both objects while ignoring case

__hash__()¶

Overriding the hash function to allow objects in sets/lists to be compared

Overriding this function to

__str__()¶

Old method for returning a String representation of the object

__unicode__()¶

Returns a String representation of the object Equivalent to Java’s toString() method

__weakref__¶

list of weak references to the object (if defined)
